ProcessTemplates.Name: Order EDI D96A to SAP
ProcessTemplates.Description: Frends process template for getting an EDI D96A Order file and creating new Order in SAP.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"SftpHost":{"Value":"\"sftphost.example.org\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP host from where to get the EDI file."},"SftpUsername":{"Value":"\"username\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP username."},"SftpPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP password."},"SftpEDIFilePath":{"Value":"\"/edi.txt\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path to the EDI file on SFTP server."},"SapHost":{"Value":"\"https://my_sap_host_odata.example.org\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SAP host for importing the Purchase Order."},"SapUsername":{"Value":"\"SAPUSER\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SAP username."},"SapPassword":{"Value":"\"SAPPWD\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SAP password."},"SapPort":{"Value":"\"44323\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":""}}
